item.title: Workshop Schedule
item.description: An outline of the workshop schedule is included below, with links to the workshop notes from each session. Specific skills covered at each workshop are subject to change, but the general outline of topics should remain the same. Learn more about the R Spatial Workshop on our main Events page. Date Topic January 15, 2019 Introduction to spatial data January 22, 2019 Single-dataset GIS operations January 29, 2019 Multi-dataset GIS operations pt 1 February 5, 2019 Multi-dataset GIS operations pt 2 February 12, 2019 R Markdown February 19, 2019 Custom static and animated maps February 26, 2019 Visualization with interactive maps March 5, 2019 Interactive web maps with Shiny
